BBjGridExWidget.Columns

Interface BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup, BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManager

    public interface BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface
    The inteface defines the common methods for columns and column groups managment
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher
